snippet: Gov. Lincoln Chafee is expected to sign into law the first “Homeless Bill of Rights” in the United States.
abstract: Rhode Island Gov Lincoln Chafee is expected to sign into law the first Homeless Bill of Rights in the United States; law would guarantee a person the right to use public sidewalks, parks and transportation as well as public buildings without discrimination.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Lincoln Chafee is expected to sign into law the first “Homeless Bill of Rights” in the United States.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Governor Expected to Sign ‘Homeless Bill of Rights’
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Governor Expected To Sign ‘homeless Bill of Rights’
